document_api_meta.title: Search Open Collaboration
document_api_meta.env_desc: Retrieve all open collaboration information from merchants, including commission rate, add to showcase and post content creator count.

request_header_param.name: x-tts-access-token
request_header_param.desc: The seller access_token value from [Get Access Token](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a3292b0f40314a92d75#Get%20Access%20Token%20API), when user_type = 0. Follow this [guide](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a344ddec3030b238fa0) to get seller access_token.

request_query_param.name: app_key
request_query_param.desc: Every single app will have a unique key. Please use the specific key assigned to your app.

request_query_param.name: sign
request_query_param.desc: Signature generated by gen algorithm. When you send API requests to TTS, you must sign them so that TTS can identify the senders.

request_query_param.name: timestamp
request_query_param.desc: Unix timestamp GMT (UTC+00:00). This timestamp is used across all API requests. Developers can use this convert to local time.

request_query_param.name: page_token
request_query_param.desc: Pagination offset determines where you begin to search for. It's empty when you raise your first request.

request_query_param.name: page_size
request_query_param.desc: The value of "page_size" must be greater than 0 and less than or equal to 100.

request_query_param.name: sort_order
request_query_param.desc:
Default value of "sort_order" is DESC.
Enum:
- ASC：means to sort data in ascending order
- DESC：means to sort data in descending order

request_query_param.name: sort_field
request_query_param.desc:
Some sorting fields are as follows:
- product_original_price: sort by products' original price.
By default, the open collaborations are sorted in descending order by creation time.

request_query_param.name: shop_cipher
request_query_param.desc:
Use this property to pass shop information in requesting the API. Failure in passing the correct value when requesting the API for cross-border shops will return incorrect response. 
Get by API [Get Authorization Shop](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/6507ead7b99d5302be949ba9?external_id=6507ead7b99d5302be949ba9)

request_body_param.name: keyword_type
request_body_param.desc:
Pass in the parameter type which you use to query open collaborations. 
You can query based on:
- PRODUCT_ID：If you use PRODUCT_ID  to search, you can search for open collaboration information for a specified product ID.
- PRODUCT_NAME: If you use PRODUCT_NAME to search, you can fuzzy search for open collaboration information involving related product names.

request_body_param.name: keyword
request_body_param.desc: Search based on the product name or product ID. Pass in the appropriate value based on the keyword_type above.

request_body_param.name: top_level_category_id
request_body_param.desc:
The category of the searched product needs to be limited in this param.
Prerequisites:
- The value of field category_id must be greater than 0.
- Currently, it only supports first-level categories

response_param.name: code
response_param.desc: The success or failure status code returned in API response.

response_param.name: message
response_param.desc: The success or failure messages returned in API response. Reasons of failure will be described in the message.

response_param.name: request_id
response_param.desc: Request log

response_param.name: data
response_param.desc: Specific return information

response_param.name: ^next_page_token
response_param.desc: Next page token

response_param.name: ^total_count
response_param.desc: Total count of products that satisfy all the input search conditions.

response_param.name: ^open_collaborations
response_param.desc: The open collaborations

response_param.name: ^^id
response_param.desc: The open collaboration id

response_param.name: ^^status
response_param.desc:
Status of open collaboration. 
Field values:
- NORMAL：NORMAL means the current open collaboration status is normal and in effect.
- TERMINATING: TERMINATING means that the merchant has removed open collaboration and the open collaboration will expire soon. The expiration time can be found at the end_time of current_commission.
The open collaborations which were removed and expired will not be returned in the response.

response_param.name: ^^current_commission
response_param.desc: The commission information is currently in effect for this open collaboration.

response_param.name: ^^^rate
response_param.desc:
The commission rate for this product is set by merchants for creators' public promotion.
The range of this value is [100, 8000].
This value is expressed in 1/10000 increments. For example: 3000 means the actual commission rate is 30.00%, and 3555 means 35.55%

response_param.name: ^^^start_time
response_param.desc: The time when the commission rate becomes effective.

response_param.name: ^^^end_time
response_param.desc: The effective end time of the commission rate.

response_param.name: ^^showcase_creator_count
response_param.desc: This field indicates the number of creators who added the product to the showcase from open collaboration.

response_param.name: ^^content_creator_count
response_param.desc: This field indicates the number of creators who posted the LIve or Video from open collaboration.

response_param.name: ^^product
response_param.desc: The open collaboration bound product information.

response_param.name: ^^^id
response_param.desc: Product's unique id.

response_param.name: ^^^title
response_param.desc: Product's name.

response_param.name: ^^^main_image_url
response_param.desc: The product image url.

response_param.name: ^^^status
response_param.desc:
Product's status.
Field values:
- LIVE: When the product is normal for sale, return to the LIVE status
- OUT_OF_STOCK: When the product is out of stock for the consumer, the OUT_OF_STOCK state is returned
- SELLER_DEACTIVATE:  When the product is deactivated by the merchant, the SELLER_DEACTIVATE status is returned
- PLATFORM_DEACTIVATE: When the product is deactivated by the platform or is not available for sale, the PLATFORM_DEACTIVATE status is returned
- GNE_REJECT: When the product is governed or the open collaboration is dismissed, the GNE_REJECT state is returned
- DELETE: When the product is deleted, the DELETE status is returned
- OTHER: When the product is in an unsaleable state, such as draft, frozen, review, etc, the OTHER status is returned

response_param.name: ^^^inventory
response_param.desc: The inventory of this product.

response_param.name: ^^^original_price
response_param.desc: The product's original price

response_param.name: ^^^^currency
response_param.desc: Currency Symbol

response_param.name: ^^^^minimum_amount
response_param.desc: The minimum original price of all skus of this product.

response_param.name: ^^^^maximum_amount
response_param.desc: The maximum original price of all skus of this product.

sample_code.label: Go
sample_code.value:
// For more details about the SDK, refer to the documentation:
// https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/67c83e0799a75104986ae498
func affiliateSeller202412SearchOpenCollaborationPost() {
    configuration := apis.NewConfiguration()
    configuration.AddAppInfo(appKey, appSecret)
    apiClient := apis.NewAPIClient(configuration)
    request := apiClient.AffiliateSellerV202412API.AffiliateSeller202412OpenCollaborationsSearchPost(context.Background())
    request = request.XTtsAccessToken("your access token")
    request = request.ContentType("application/json")
    request = request.PageToken("b2Zmc2V0PTAK")
    request = request.PageSize(50)
    request = request.SortOrder("DESC")
    request = request.SortField("product_original_price")
    request = request.ShopCipher("your shop cipher")
    affiliateSeller202412SearchOpenCollaborationRequestBody := affiliateSeller_v202412.NewAffiliateSeller202412SearchOpenCollaborationRequestBody()
    affiliateSeller202412SearchOpenCollaborationRequestBody.SetKeywordType("PRODUCT_ID")
    affiliateSeller202412SearchOpenCollaborationRequestBody.SetKeyword("7625459350921")
    affiliateSeller202412SearchOpenCollaborationRequestBody.SetTopLevelCategoryId("60001")
    request = request.AffiliateSeller202412SearchOpenCollaborationRequestBody(*affiliateSeller202412SearchOpenCollaborationRequestBody)
    resp, httpResp, err := request.Execute()
    if err != nil || httpResp.StatusCode != 200 {
        fmt.Printf("productsRequest err:%v resbody:%s", err, httpResp.Body)
        return
    }
    if resp == nil {
        fmt.Printf("response is nil")
        return
    }
    if resp.GetCode()!= 0 {
        fmt.Printf("response business is error, errorCode:%d errorMessage:%s", resp.GetCode(), resp.GetMessage())
        return
    }
    respDataJson, _ := json.MarshalIndent(resp.GetData(), "", "  ")
    fmt.Println("response data:", string(respDataJson))
    return
}

sample_code.label: Node.js
Java

scope_list.package_description: The application will be able to access a Seller's overall TikTok Shop Affiliate Collaborations, including but not limited to collaboration details (e.g., activity, applications, descriptions, and performance), creator participation/engagement results, affiliate links, affiliate orders, and sample rules.
scope_list.auth_info: The application will be able to access your TikTok Shop Affiliate Collaborations, including but not limited to collaboration activity and performance, creator participation/engagement results, affiliate links, and affiliate orders.
